trans-unit.source: ...continues until all replicas for this master are returned.
trans-unit.target: ...继续，直到返回该主服务器的所有副本。

trans-unit.source: 1 if at least 1 HyperLogLog internal register was altered. 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少有1个HyperLogLog内部寄存器被更改,则为1。否则为0。

trans-unit.source: BITFIELD is able to operate with multiple bit fields in the same command call. It takes a list of operations to perform, and returns an array of replies, where each array matches the corresponding operation in the list of arguments.
trans-unit.target: BITFIELD能够在同一命令调用中使用多个位字段进行操作。它获取要执行的操作的列表，并返回一个答复数组，其中每个数组都与参数列表中的相应操作匹配。

trans-unit.source: BITOP is a good complement to the pattern documented in the BITCOUNT command documentation. Different bitmaps can be combined in order to obtain a target bitmap where the population counting operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: BITOP是BITCOUNT命令文档中记录的模式的很好的补充。可以组合不同的位图以获得执行填充计数操作的目标位图。

trans-unit.source: BITOP is a potentially slow command as it runs in O(N) time. Care should be taken when running it against long input strings.
trans-unit.target: BITOP是一个可能很慢的命令，因为它以O（N）时间运行。在长输入字符串上运行时应小心。

trans-unit.source: BLPOP can be used with pipelining (sending multiple commands and reading the replies in batch), however this setup makes sense almost solely when it is the last command of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: BLPOP可以与流水线一起使用（发送多个命令并批量读取答复），但是这种设置几乎仅在流水线的最后一个命令时才有意义。

trans-unit.source: BLPOP guarantees to return an element from the list stored at list2 (since it is the first non empty list when checking list1, list2 and list3 in that order).
trans-unit.target: BLPOP保证从存储在 list2 的列表中返回一个元素（因为按顺序检查 list1 ， list2 和 list3 时，它是第一个非空列表）。

trans-unit.source: BLPOP is a blocking list pop primitive. It is the blocking version of LPOP because it blocks the connection when there are no elements to pop from any of the given lists. An element is popped from the head of the first list that is non-empty, with the given keys being checked in the order that they are given.
trans-unit.target: BLPOP是阻止列表弹出原语。它是LPOP的阻止版本，因为在没有任何要从任何给定列表中弹出的元素时，它会阻止连接。从第一个列表的头部弹出一个非空的元素，并以给定的键顺序检查给定的键。

trans-unit.source: BRPOP is a blocking list pop primitive. It is the blocking version of RPOP because it blocks the connection when there are no elements to pop from any of the given lists. An element is popped from the tail of the first list that is non-empty, with the given keys being checked in the order that they are given.
trans-unit.target: BRPOP是阻止列表弹出原语。它是RPOP的阻止版本，因为在没有任何要从任何给定列表中弹出的元素时，它会阻止连接。从第一个列表的尾部弹出一个非空元素，并按给定键的顺序检查给定键。

trans-unit.source: BRPOPLPUSH is the blocking variant of RPOPLPUSH. When source contains elements, this command behaves exactly like RPOPLPUSH. When used inside a MULTI/EXEC block, this command behaves exactly like RPOPLPUSH. When source is empty, Redis will block the connection until another client pushes to it or until timeout is reached. A timeout of zero can be used to block indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: BRPOPLPUSH是的阻挡变体RPOPLPUSH。当 source 包含元素时，此命令的行为与RPOPLPUSH完全相同。在MULTI / EXEC块中使用时，此命令的行为与RPOPLPUSH完全相同。当 source 为空时，Redis将阻止连接，直到另一个客户端将其推送或达到 timeout 为止。甲 timeout 的零可以用于无限期地阻塞。

trans-unit.source: BZPOPMAX is the blocking variant of the sorted set ZPOPMAX primitive.
trans-unit.target: BZPOPMAX是排序集ZPOPMAX原语的阻塞变体。

trans-unit.source: BZPOPMIN is the blocking variant of the sorted set ZPOPMIN primitive.
trans-unit.target: BZPOPMIN是排序集ZPOPMIN原语的阻塞变体。

trans-unit.source: CLIENT PAUSE is a connections control command able to suspend all the Redis clients for the specified amount of time (in milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: CLIENT PAUSE是一个连接控制命令，能够将所有Redis客户端挂起指定的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: CLUSTER FAILOVER, unless the TAKEOVER option is specified, does not execute a failover synchronously, it only schedules a manual failover, bypassing the failure detection stage, so to check if the failover actually happened, CLUSTER NODES or other means should be used in order to verify that the state of the cluster changes after some time the command was sent.
trans-unit.target: 除非指定了TAKEOVER选项，否则CLUSTER FAILOVER不会同步执行故障转移，它仅安排手动故障转移，绕过故障检测阶段，因此要检查故障转移是否确实发生，应使用CLUSTER NODES或其他方式进行发送命令一段时间后，请验证集群状态是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: CLUSTER INFO provides INFO style information about Redis Cluster vital parameters. The following is a sample output, followed by the description of each field reported.
trans-unit.target: CLUSTER INFO提供有关Redis Cluster重要参数的INFO样式信息。以下是示例输出，然后是报告的每个字段的描述。

trans-unit.source: CLUSTER MEET is used in order to connect different Redis nodes with cluster support enabled, into a working cluster.
trans-unit.target: CLUSTER MEET用于将启用了群集支持的不同Redis节点连接到工作群集中。

trans-unit.source: CLUSTER NODES provides all this information, that is, the current cluster configuration of the node we are contacting, in a serialization format which happens to be exactly the same as the one used by Redis Cluster itself in order to store on disk the cluster state (however the on disk cluster state has a few additional info appended at the end).
trans-unit.target: CLUSTER NODES以序列化格式提供所有这些信息，即我们正在联系的节点的当前集群配置，该格式恰好与Redis Cluster本身用来在磁盘上存储集群状态所使用的格式相同（但是磁盘上的群集状态在末尾附加了一些其他信息）。

trans-unit.source: CLUSTER SETSLOT is responsible of changing the state of a hash slot in the receiving node in different ways. It can, depending on the subcommand used:
trans-unit.target: CLUSTER SETSLOT负责以不同方式更改接收节点中哈希槽的状态。根据所使用的子命令，它可以：

trans-unit.source: CLUSTER SLOTS returns details about which cluster slots map to which Redis instances. The command is suitable to be used by Redis Cluster client libraries implementations in order to retrieve (or update when a redirection is received) the map associating cluster hash slots with actual nodes network coordinates (composed of an IP address and a TCP port), so that when a command is received, it can be sent to what is likely the right instance for the keys specified in the command.
trans-unit.target: CLUSTER SLOTS返回有关哪些集群插槽映射到哪些Redis实例的详细信息。该命令适合Redis Cluster客户端库实现使用，以便检索（或在收到重定向时更新）将群集哈希槽与实际节点网络坐标（由IP地址和TCP端口组成）相关联的映射，因此当收到命令时，可以将其发送到该命令中指定键的正确实例。

trans-unit.source: COMMAND shows some commands as having movablekeys meaning the entire command must be parsed to discover storage or retrieval keys. You can use COMMAND GETKEYS to discover key positions directly from how Redis parses the commands.
trans-unit.target: COMMAND将某些命令显示为具有可移动键，这意味着必须分析整个命令才能发现存储或检索键。您可以使用COMMAND GETKEYS直接从Redis解析命令的方式中发现关键位置。

trans-unit.source: COMMAND GETKEYS is a helper command to let you find the keys from a full Redis command.
trans-unit.target: COMMAND GETKEYS是一个帮助程序命令，可让您从完整的Redis命令中查找密钥。

trans-unit.source: CONFIG GET takes a single argument, which is a glob-style pattern. All the configuration parameters matching this parameter are reported as a list of key-value pairs. Example:
trans-unit.target: CONFIG GET接受一个参数，这是一个glob样式的模式。与该参数匹配的所有配置参数均报告为键值对列表。例：

trans-unit.source: DEBUG OBJECT is a debugging command that should not be used by clients. Check the OBJECT command instead.
trans-unit.target: DEBUG OBJECT是一个调试命令，客户端不应使用。而是检查OBJECT命令。

trans-unit.source: DEBUG SEGFAULT performs an invalid memory access that crashes Redis. It is used to simulate bugs during the development.
trans-unit.target: DEBUG SEGFAULT执行无效的内存访问，这会使 Redis崩溃。它用于在开发过程中模拟错误。

trans-unit.source: EVAL - keys stop after numkeys count arguments
trans-unit.target: EVAL -键停止后 numkeys 计算参数

trans-unit.source: EVAL and EVALSHA are used to evaluate scripts using the Lua interpreter built into Redis starting from version 2.6.0.
trans-unit.target: 从2.6.0版开始，EVAL和EVALSHA用于使用Redis内置的Lua解释器评估脚本。

trans-unit.source: EVALSHA - keys stop after numkeys count arguments
trans-unit.target: EVALSHA-在 numkeys 个计数参数后，键停止

trans-unit.source: EVALSHA works exactly like EVAL, but instead of having a script as the first argument it has the SHA1 digest of a script. The behavior is the following:
trans-unit.target: EVALSHA的工作原理与EVAL完全相同，但是它没有脚本作为第一个参数，而是具有脚本的SHA1摘要。该行为如下：

trans-unit.source: EXPIRE would return 0 and not alter the timeout for a key with a timeout set.
trans-unit.target: EXPIRE将返回0，并且不会更改设置了超时的键的超时。

trans-unit.source: EXPIREAT has the same effect and semantic as EXPIRE, but instead of specifying the number of seconds representing the TTL (time to live), it takes an absolute Unix timestamp (seconds since January 1, 1970). A timestamp in the past will delete the key immediately.
trans-unit.target: EXPIREAT具有与EXPIRE相同的作用和语义，但是它没有指定表示TTL（生存时间）的秒数，而是使用了绝对的Unix时间戳（自1970年1月1日以来的秒数）。过去的时间戳会立即删除密钥。

trans-unit.source: EXPIREAT was introduced in order to convert relative timeouts to absolute timeouts for the AOF persistence mode. Of course, it can be used directly to specify that a given key should expire at a given time in the future.
trans-unit.target: 引入EXPIREAT是为了将AOF持久性模式的相对超时转换为绝对超时。当然，它可以直接用于指定给定密钥应在将来的给定时间到期。

trans-unit.source: GET arity is 2 since the command only accepts one argument and always has the format GET _key_.
trans-unit.target: GET arity为2，因为该命令仅接受一个参数，并且始终具有 GET _key_ 格式。

trans-unit.source: GETRANGE allows for random access of elements. If our time series have associated time information we can easily implement a binary search to get range combining GETRANGE with the Lua scripting engine available in Redis 2.6.
trans-unit.target: GETRANGE允许元素的随机访问。如果我们的时间序列具有关联的时间信息，则我们可以轻松实现二进制搜索，以将GETRANGE与Redis 2.6中提供的Lua脚本引擎结合起来以获得范围。

trans-unit.source: GETSET can be used together with INCR for counting with atomic reset. For example: a process may call INCR against the key mycounter every time some event occurs, but from time to time we need to get the value of the counter and reset it to zero atomically. This can be done using GETSET mycounter "0":
trans-unit.target: GETSET可与INCR一起用于原子复位计数。例如：某个事件每次发生时，进程可能会针对密钥 mycounter 调用INCR，但我们有时会需要获取计数器的值并将其自动重置为零。这可以使用 GETSET mycounter "0" ：

trans-unit.target: HSCAN元素数组包含针对哈希的每个返回元素的两个元素，即字段和值。

trans-unit.source: HSCAN iterates fields of Hash types and their associated values.

trans-unit.source: Array reply The command returns an array of integers that correspond to the specified SHA1 digest arguments. For every corresponding SHA1 digest of a script that actually exists in the script cache, an 1 is returned, otherwise 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 数组回复该命令返回一个整数数组，该整数与指定的SHA1摘要参数相对应。对于脚本高速缓存中实际存在的脚本的每个对应的SHA1摘要，将返回1，否则返回0。

trans-unit.target: 数组回复，特别是：

trans-unit.source: Array reply: From 0 to count key names in a Redis array reply.
trans-unit.target: 数组回复：从0开始计算 Redis数组回复中的键名。

trans-unit.source: Array reply: a list of active channels, optionally matching the specified pattern.
trans-unit.target: 数组回复：活动通道的列表，可以选择匹配指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: Array reply: a list of channels and number of subscribers for every channel. The format is channel, count, channel, count, ..., so the list is flat. The order in which the channels are listed is the same as the order of the channels specified in the command call.
trans-unit.target: 数组回复：频道列表和每个频道的订户数量。格式为通道，计数，通道，计数，...，因此列表是平坦的。列出通道的顺序与命令调用中指定的通道的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: Array reply: a list of subcommands and their descriptions
trans-unit.target: 数组回复：子命令及其说明的列表

trans-unit.source: Array reply: all elements of the set.
trans-unit.target: 数组回复：集合中的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Array reply: each element being the reply to each of the commands in the atomic transaction.
trans-unit.target: 数组reply：每个元素是对原子事务中每个命令的答复。

trans-unit.target: 数组回复：指定范围内的元素列表（可以选择分数）。

trans-unit.target: 数组回复：指定分数范围内的元素列表。

trans-unit.source: Array reply: list of fields and their values stored in the hash, or an empty list when key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 数组回复：存储在哈希中的字段及其值的列表，或者当 key 不存在时为空列表。

trans-unit.target: 数组回复：命令详细信息的嵌套列表。命令以随机顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: Bulk string reply: The serialized cluster configuration.

trans-unit.target: 批量字符串答复：正在弹出并推送的元素。

trans-unit.target: 批量字符串答复：与 field 关联的值，或者当散列或 key 中不存在 field 时为 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Bulk string reply: the value of key after the increment.
trans-unit.target: 批量字符串回复：递增后的 key 。

trans-unit.source: Bulk string reply: without the additional count argument the command returns a Bulk Reply with the randomly selected element, or nil when key does not exist. Array reply: when the additional count argument is passed the command returns an array of elements, or an empty array when key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 大容量字符串答复：不带附加 count 参数的命令将返回带有随机选择的元素的大容量答复，如果 key 不存在，则返回 nil 。数组回复：当传递附加的 count 参数时，该命令将返回一个元素数组，或者当 key 不存在时返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.target: 整数回复，特别是：

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: TTL in milliseconds, or a negative value in order to signal an error (see the description above).
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：TTL（以毫秒为单位），或者为负值，以表示错误（请参见上面的描述）。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: TTL in seconds, or a negative value in order to signal an error (see the description above).
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：TTL（以秒为单位），或者为负值，以表示错误（请参见上面的描述）。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: The command returns the number of replicas reached by all the writes performed in the context of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：该命令返回在当前连接的上下文中执行的所有写入所达到的副本数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: The hash slot number.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：哈希槽号。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: The number of keys in the specified hash slot, or an error if the hash slot is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：指定哈希槽中的键数，如果哈希槽无效，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: The number of keys that were removed.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：已删除的键数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: The number of keys that were touched.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：触摸过的按键数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: The number of keys that were unlinked.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：取消链接的键数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: an UNIX time stamp.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：UNIX时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: number of commands returned by COMMAND
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：COMMAND返回的命令数

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: number of fields in the hash, or 0 when key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：哈希中的字段数，如果 key 不存在，则为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the bit value stored at offset.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：以偏移量存储的位值。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the cardinality (number of elements) of the set, or 0 if key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：集合的基数（元素数）；如果 key 不存在，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the cardinality (number of elements) of the sorted set, or 0 if key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：排序集的基数（元素数），如果 key 不存在，则为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the list after the insert operation, or -1 when the value pivot was not found.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：插入操作后列表的长度；如果找不到值 pivot 则返回 -1 。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the list after the push operation.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：推送操作后列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the list after the push operations.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：推送操作后列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the list at key.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复： key 列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the string after it was modified by the command.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：命令修改后的字符串长度。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the string after the append operation.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：追加操作后字符串的长度。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the length of the string at key, or 0 when key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复： key 处的字符串长度，如果 key 不存在，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the memory usage in bytes
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：以字节为单位的内存使用情况

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of active failure reports for the node.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：节点的活动故障报告数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of clients killed.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：被杀死的客户端数量。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of clients that received the message.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：收到消息的客户端数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of elements in the resulting set.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：结果集中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of elements in the resulting sorted set at destination.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复： destination 结果排序集中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of elements in the specified score range.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：指定分数范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of elements removed.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：删除的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of elements that were added to the set, not including all the elements already present into the set.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：已添加到集合中的元素数量，不包括已经存在于集合中的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of entries actually deleted.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：实际删除的条目数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of entries of the stream at key.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复： key 处流的条目数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of fields that were removed from the hash, not including specified but non existing fields.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：从哈希中删除的字段数，不包括指定的但不存在的字段。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of members that were removed from the set, not including non existing members.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：从集合中删除的成员数，不包括不存在的成员。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of patterns all the clients are subscribed to.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：所有客户端已订阅的模式数。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the number of removed elements.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：已删除元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the original bit value stored at offset.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：将原始位值存储在offset处。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the string length of the value associated with field, or zero when field is not present in the hash or key does not exist at all.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：与 field 关联的值的字符串长度，或者当散列或 key 中不存在 field 时根本不为零。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the value at field after the increment operation.
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：增量操作后 field 的值。

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the value of key after the decrement
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：减后的 key

trans-unit.source: Integer reply: the value of key after the increment
trans-unit.target: 整数回复：增量后的 key

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply on error. On success nothing is returned since the server quits and the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 对错误的简单字符串答复。成功后，由于服务器退出并且连接已关闭，因此不会返回任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if SET was executed correctly. Null reply: a Null Bulk Reply is returned if the SET operation was not performed because the user specified the NX or XX option but the condition was not met.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK ，如果SET被正确执行。空回复：如果由于用户指定了 NX 或 XX 选项但不满足条件而未执行SET操作，则返回空批量回复。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if SWAPDB was executed correctly.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK ，如果SWAPDB被正确执行。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if the command was accepted and a manual failover is going to be attempted. An error if the operation cannot be executed, for example if we are talking with a node which is already a master.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK 如果命令被接受和手动故障转移将被尝试。如果无法执行该操作（例如，如果我们正在与已经是主节点的节点进行对话），则会发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if the command was executed successfully, otherwise an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：如果命令已成功执行，则为 OK ，否则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if the command was successful. If the address or port specified are invalid an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：如果命令成功，则 OK 。如果指定的地址或端口无效，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if the command was successful. Otherwise an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：如果命令成功，则 OK 。否则，将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if the connection exists and has been closed
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK ，如果连接存在，并已被关闭

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK if the connection name was successfully set.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK ，如果连接名称设置成功。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK or an error if the operation fails.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复： OK 或者操作失败将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK when the configuration was rewritten properly. Otherwise an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK 当配置被正确地改写。否则，将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK when the configuration was set properly. Otherwise an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK 当配置了正确设置。否则，将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: OK.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复： OK 。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: All the subcommands return OK if the command was successful. Otherwise an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复：如果命令成功，则所有子命令都将返回 OK 。否则，将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: The command just returns OK.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复：该命令仅返回 OK 。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: The command returns OK on success, or NOKEY if no keys were found in the source instance.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：命令成功返回OK，如果在源实例中未找到任何键，则返回 NOKEY 。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: The command returns OK on success.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：命令成功返回OK。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: The command returns OK or an error if the timeout is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：如果超时无效，该命令将返回OK或错误。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: The commands returns OK on success.
trans-unit.target: 简单字符串答复：命令成功返回OK。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: always OK since MSET can't fail.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复：总是 OK ，因为MSET不会失败。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: always OK.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复：总是 OK 。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: always OK.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复：总是可以的。

trans-unit.source: Simple string reply: type of key, or none when key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 简单的字符串回复：类型 key ，或 none 时， key 不存在。

trans-unit.source: KEYS -- If the key argument is an empty string, the command will instead migrate all the keys that follow the KEYS option (see the above section for more info).
trans-unit.target: KEYS-如果key参数是一个空字符串，则该命令将迁移所有在KEYS选项之后的键（有关更多信息，请参见上一节）。

trans-unit.source: MGET arity is -2 since the command accepts at a minimum one argument, but up to an unlimited number: MGET _key1_ [key2] [key3] ....
trans-unit.target: MGET元数为-2，因为命令接受至少一个参数，但到无限数量： MGET _key1_ [key2] [key3] ... 。

trans-unit.source: MIGRATE needs to perform I/O operations and to honor the specified timeout. When there is an I/O error during the transfer or if the timeout is reached the operation is aborted and the special error - IOERR returned. When this happens the following two cases are possible:
trans-unit.target: MIGRATE需要执行I / O操作并遵守指定的超时。如果在传输过程中发生I / O错误，或者如果达到超时，操作将中止，并返回特殊错误 IOERR 。发生这种情况时，可能出现以下两种情况：

trans-unit.source: MONITOR is a debugging command that streams back every command processed by the Redis server. It can help in understanding what is happening to the database. This command can both be used via redis-cli and via telnet.
trans-unit.target: MONITOR是一个调试命令，可将Redis服务器处理的每个命令流回。它可以帮助您了解数据库正在发生的事情。可以通过 redis-cli 和 telnet 使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: MSET is atomic, so all given keys are set at once. It is not possible for clients to see that some of the keys were updated while others are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MSET是原子的，因此所有给定的密钥都将立即设置。客户看不到某些键已更新，而其他键未更改。

trans-unit.source: MSETNX is atomic, so all given keys are set at once. It is not possible for clients to see that some of the keys were updated while others are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MSETNX是原子的，因此所有给定的密钥都可以一次设置。客户看不到某些键已更新，而其他键未更改。

trans-unit.source: PEXPIREAT has the same effect and semantic as EXPIREAT, but the Unix time at which the key will expire is specified in milliseconds instead of seconds.
trans-unit.target: PEXPIREAT具有相同的效果和语义为EXPIREAT，但Unix时间，在这毫秒，而不是秒指定的键将到期。

trans-unit.source: PSETEX works exactly like SETEX with the sole difference that the expire time is specified in milliseconds instead of seconds.
trans-unit.target: PSETEX的工作方式与SETEX完全相同，唯一的区别是到期时间以毫秒而不是秒为单位指定。

trans-unit.source: READONLY tells a Redis Cluster replica node that the client is willing to read possibly stale data and is not interested in running write queries.
trans-unit.target: READONLY告诉Redis Cluster副本节点，客户端愿意读取可能过时的数据，并且不希望运行写入查询。

trans-unit.source: RESTORE checks the RDB version and data checksum. If they don't match an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: RESTORE检查RDB版本和数据校验和。如果它们不匹配，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: RESTORE will return a "Target key name is busy" error when key already exists unless you use the REPLACE modifier (Redis 3.0 or greater).
trans-unit.target: 如果 key 已经存在，则除非使用 REPLACE 修饰符（Redis 3.0或更高版本），否则RESTORE将返回“目标密钥名称正忙”错误。

trans-unit.source: RPOPLPUSH (or BRPOPLPUSH for the blocking variant) offers a way to avoid this problem: the consumer fetches the message and at the same time pushes it into a processing list. It will use the LREM command in order to remove the message from the processing list once the message has been processed.
trans-unit.target: RPOPLPUSH（或对于阻塞变体为BRPOPLPUSH）提供了一种避免此问题的方法：使用者获取消息，同时将其推入处理列表。一旦处理完消息，它将使用LREM命令从处理列表中删除消息。

trans-unit.source: SCAN array of elements is a list of keys.
trans-unit.target: 元素的SCAN数组是键的列表。

trans-unit.source: SCAN family functions do not guarantee that the number of elements returned per call are in a given range. The commands are also allowed to return zero elements, and the client should not consider the iteration complete as long as the returned cursor is not zero.
trans-unit.target: SCAN系列功能不保证每次调用返回的元素数在给定范围内。还允许命令返回零元素，并且只要返回的游标不为零，客户端就不应认为迭代已完成。

trans-unit.source: SCAN iterates the set of keys in the currently selected Redis database.
trans-unit.target: SCAN迭代当前选择的Redis数据库中的密钥集。

trans-unit.source: SCAN, SSCAN, HSCAN and ZSCAN return a two elements multi-bulk reply, where the first element is a string representing an unsigned 64 bit number (the cursor), and the second element is a multi-bulk with an array of elements.
trans-unit.target: SCAN，SSCAN，HSCAN和ZSCAN返回两个元素的多体答复，其中第一个元素是表示无符号64位数字（光标）的字符串，第二个元素是具有元素数组的多体。

trans-unit.source: SETEX is atomic, and can be reproduced by using the previous two commands inside an MULTI / EXEC block. It is provided as a faster alternative to the given sequence of operations, because this operation is very common when Redis is used as a cache.
trans-unit.target: SETEX是原子的，可以使用MULTI / EXEC块中的前两个命令来复制。它是给定操作序列的更快替代方法，因为当Redis用作缓存时，此操作非常常见。

trans-unit.source: SETRANGE can be used to overwrite an existing time series.
trans-unit.target: SETRANGE可用于覆盖现有时间序列。

trans-unit.source: SORT - optional STORE key, optional BY weights, optional GET keys
trans-unit.target: 排序 -可选的 STORE 键，可选的 BY 权重，可选的GET键

trans-unit.source: SSCAN array of elements is a list of Set members.
trans-unit.target: SSCAN元素数组是Set成员的列表。

trans-unit.source: SSCAN iterates elements of Sets types.
trans-unit.target: SSCAN迭代Sets类型的元素。

trans-unit.source: STRLEN can be used in order to obtain the number of samples.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用STRLEN以获得样本数。

trans-unit.source: SYNC. Enable blocking synchronous debugging of Lua scripts (saves changes to data).
trans-unit.target: SYNC。启用阻止Lua脚本的同步调试（保存对数据的更改）。

trans-unit.source: XADD is the only Redis command that can add data to a stream, but there are other commands, such as XDEL and XTRIM, that are able to remove data from a stream.
trans-unit.target: XADD是唯一可以将数据添加到流的Redis命令，但是还有其他命令（例如XDEL和XTRIM）能够从流中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: XTRIM trims the stream to a given number of items, evicting older items (items with lower IDs) if needed. The command is conceived to accept multiple trimming strategies, however currently only a single one is implemented, which is MAXLEN, and works exactly as the MAXLEN option in XADD.
trans-unit.target: XTRIM将流修剪为给定数量的项目，并根据需要逐出较旧的项目（ID较低的项目）。该命令被认为可以接受多种修整策略，但是目前仅实现了一种，即 MAXLEN ，并且与 MAXLEN 中的MAXLEN选项完全相同。

trans-unit.source: ZINTERSTORE - keys stop when WEIGHT or AGGREGATE starts
trans-unit.target: ZINTERSTORE-当 WEIGHT 或 AGGREGATE 开始时，按键停止

trans-unit.source: ZSCAN array of elements contain two elements, a member and its associated score, for every returned element of the sorted set.
trans-unit.target: ZSCAN元素数组包含两个元素，一个成员及其关联的分数，用于排序集中的每个返回元素。

trans-unit.source: ZSCAN iterates elements of Sorted Set types and their associated scores.
trans-unit.target: ZSCAN迭代排序集类型及其相关分数的元素。

trans-unit.source: ZUNIONSTORE - keys stop when WEIGHT or AGGREGATE starts
trans-unit.target: ZUNIONSTORE-当 WEIGHT 或 AGGREGATE 开始时，按键停止

trans-unit.source: >= 2.4: Accepts multiple field arguments. Redis versions older than 2.4 can only remove a field per call.
trans-unit.target: >= 2.4 ：接受多个 field 参数。低于2.4的Redis版本每次调用只能删除一个字段。

trans-unit.source: >= 2.4: Accepts multiple member arguments. Redis versions before 2.4 are only able to add a single member per call.
trans-unit.target: >= 2.4 ：接受多个 member 参数。2.4之前的Redis版本只能为每个呼叫添加一个成员。

trans-unit.source: >= 2.4: Accepts multiple member arguments. Redis versions older than 2.4 can only remove a set member per call.
trans-unit.target: >= 2.4 ：接受多个 member 参数。低于2.4的Redis版本只能删除每个呼叫中​​的set成员。

trans-unit.source: >= 2.4: Accepts multiple value arguments. In Redis versions older than 2.4 it was possible to push a single value per command.
trans-unit.target: >= 2.4 ：接受多个 value 参数。在低于2.4的Redis版本中，可以为每个命令推送单个值。

trans-unit.source: >= 2.4: Accepts multiple elements. In Redis versions older than 2.4 it was possible to add or update a single member per call.
trans-unit.target: >= 2.4 ：接受多个元素。在低于2.4的Redis版本中，可以为每个呼叫添加或更新单个成员。

trans-unit.source: >= 2.4: Accepts multiple elements. In Redis versions older than 2.4 it was possible to remove a single member per call.
trans-unit.target: >= 2.4 ：接受多个元素。在低于2.4的Redis版本中，可以在每个呼叫中​​删除一个成员。

trans-unit.source: - and + special IDs
trans-unit.target: - 和 + 特殊ID

trans-unit.source: 0 if field already exists in the hash and no operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果哈希中已经存在该 field 且未执行任何操作，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if field already exists in the hash and the value was updated.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果该 field 已经存在于哈希中并且值已更新，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if key does not exist or does not have an associated timeout.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果 key 不存在或没有关联的超时，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果 key 不存在，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if key was not moved.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果 key 未移动，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if newkey already exists.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果 newkey 已经存在，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if no key was set (at least one key already existed).
trans-unit.target: 0 如果未设置任何键（至少一个键已经存在），则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if the element is not a member of source and no operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果元素不是 source 成员并且未执行任何操作，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if the element is not a member of the set, or if key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果元素不是该组的成员，或者如果 key 不存在。

trans-unit.source: 0 if the hash does not contain field, or key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果散列不包含 field 或 key 不存在，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if the key does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 0 如果密钥不存在，则为0。

trans-unit.source: 0 if the key was not set
trans-unit.target: 0 如果未设置密钥，则为0

trans-unit.source: 1 if field is a new field in the hash and value was set.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果 field 在哈希和一个新的字段 value 被设置。

trans-unit.source: 1 if key was moved.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果 key 已移动，则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if key was renamed to newkey.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果将 key 重命名为 newkey ,则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the all the keys were set.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果所有键均已设置，则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the element is a member of the set.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果元素是集合的成员，则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the element is moved.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果元素已移动，则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the hash contains field.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果哈希包含 field ,则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the key exists.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果密钥存在，则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the key was set
trans-unit.target: 1 如果设置了键，则为1

trans-unit.source: 1 if the timeout was removed.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果超时已删除，则为1。

trans-unit.source: 1 if the timeout was set.
trans-unit.target: 1 如果设置了超时，则为1。

trans-unit.source: ASC: Sort returned items from the nearest to the farthest, relative to the center.
trans-unit.target: ASC ：相对于中心，从最近到最远对返回的项目进行排序。

trans-unit.source: BLPOP inside a MULTI / EXEC transaction
trans-unit.target: BLPOP 一个内部 MULTI / EXEC 事务

trans-unit.source: CLIENT KILL ADDR ip:port. This is exactly the same as the old three-arguments behavior.
trans-unit.target: CLIENT KILL ADDR ip:port 。这与旧的三参数行为完全相同。

trans-unit.source: CLIENT KILL ID client-id. Allows to kill a client by its unique ID field, which was introduced in the CLIENT LIST command starting from Redis 2.8.12.
trans-unit.target: CLIENT KILL ID client-id 。允许通过其唯一 ID 字段杀死客户端，该客户端ID从Redis 2.8.12开始在CLIENT LIST命令中引入。

trans-unit.source: CLIENT KILL SKIPME yes/no. By default this option is set to yes, that is, the client calling the command will not get killed, however setting this option to no will have the effect of also killing the client calling the command.
trans-unit.target: CLIENT KILL SKIPME yes/no 。默认情况下，此选项设置为 yes ，也就是说，调用该命令的客户端不会被杀死，但是将此选项设置为 no 将会同时杀死调用该命令的客户端。

trans-unit.source: CLIENT KILL TYPE type, where type is one of normal, master, slave and pubsub (the master type is available from v3.2). This closes the connections of all the clients in the specified class. Note that clients blocked into the MONITOR command are considered to belong to the normal class.
trans-unit.target: CLIENT KILL TYPE type ，其中type是 normal ， master ， slave 和 pubsub 之一（从v3.2起可以使用 master 类型）。这将关闭指定类中所有客户端的连接。请注意，被阻塞在MONITOR命令中的客户端被认为属于 normal 类。

trans-unit.source: COPY -- Do not remove the key from the local instance.
trans-unit.target: COPY -不要从本地实例中删除密钥。

trans-unit.source: COPY and REPLACE are available only in 3.0 and above. KEYS is available starting with Redis 3.0.6.
trans-unit.target: COPY 和 REPLACE 仅在3.0及更高版本中可用。从Redis 3.0.6开始可以使用KEYS。

trans-unit.source: DESC: Sort returned items from the farthest to the nearest, relative to the center.
trans-unit.target: DESC ：相对于中心，从最远到最近对返回的项目进行排序。

trans-unit.source: EXseconds -- Set the specified expire time, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: EX seconds-设置指定的终止时间，以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: FLUSHALL ASYNC (Redis 4.0.0 or greater)
trans-unit.target: FLUSHALL ASYNC （Redis 4.0.0或更高版本）

trans-unit.source: FLUSHDB ASYNC (Redis 4.0.0 or greater)
trans-unit.target: FLUSHDB ASYNC （Redis 4.0.0或更高版本）

trans-unit.source: FORCE: Creates the pending message entry in the PEL even if certain specified IDs are not already in the PEL assigned to a different client. However the message must be exist in the stream, otherwise the IDs of non existing messages are ignored.
trans-unit.target: FORCE ：即使某些指定的ID在分配给其他客户端的PEL中还没有在PEL中创建挂起的消息条目。但是，消息必须在流中存在，否则将忽略不存在的消息的ID。

trans-unit.source: IDLE <ms>: Set the idle time (last time it was delivered) of the message. If IDLE is not specified, an IDLE of 0 is assumed, that is, the time count is reset because the message has now a new owner trying to process it.
trans-unit.target: IDLE <ms> ：设置消息的空闲时间（上次发送时间）。如果未指定IDLE，则将IDLE假定为0，即重置时间计数，因为该消息现在有新的所有者尝试对其进行处理。

trans-unit.source: IMPORTING subcommand: Set a hash slot in importing state.
trans-unit.target: IMPORTING 子命令：将哈希槽设置为导入状态。

trans-unit.source: JUSTID: Return just an array of IDs of messages successfully claimed, without returning the actual message.
trans-unit.target: JUSTID ：仅返回成功声明的消息ID的数组，而不返回实际消息。

trans-unit.source: MIGRATING subcommand: Set a hash slot in migrating state.
trans-unit.target: MIGRATING 子命令：将哈希槽设置为迁移状态。

trans-unit.source: NO. Disables scripts debug mode.
trans-unit.target: NO 。禁用脚本调试模式。

trans-unit.source: NODE subcommand: Bind the hash slot to a different node.
trans-unit.target: NODE 子命令：将哈希槽绑定到其他节点。

trans-unit.source: NX -- Only set the key if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: NX -仅在不存在的情况下设置密钥。

trans-unit.source: OBJECT ENCODING <key> returns the kind of internal representation used in order to store the value associated with a key.
trans-unit.target: OBJECT ENCODING <key> 返回用于存储与键关联的值的内部表示类型。

trans-unit.source: OBJECT FREQ <key> returns the logarithmic access frequency counter of the object stored at the specified key. This subcommand is available when maxmemory-policy is set to an LFU policy.
trans-unit.target: OBJECT FREQ <key> 返回存储在指定键处的对象的对数访问频率计数器。当 maxmemory-policy 设置为LFU策略时，此子命令可用。

trans-unit.source: OBJECT HELP returns a succint help text.
trans-unit.target: OBJECT HELP 返回简要的帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: OBJECT IDLETIME <key> returns the number of seconds since the object stored at the specified key is idle (not requested by read or write operations). While the value is returned in seconds the actual resolution of this timer is 10 seconds, but may vary in future implementations. This subcommand is available when maxmemory-policy is set to an LRU policy or noeviction.
trans-unit.target: OBJECT IDLETIME <key> 返回自存储在指定键处的对象处于空闲状态以来的秒数（读取或写入操作不请求）。虽然以秒为单位返回该值，但此计时器的实际分辨率为10秒，但在将来的实现中可能会有所不同。当 maxmemory-policy 设置为LRU策略或 noeviction 时，此子命令可用。

trans-unit.source: OBJECT REFCOUNT <key> returns the number of references of the value associated with the specified key. This command is mainly useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: OBJECT REFCOUNT <key> 返回与指定键关联的值的引用数。该命令主要用于调试。

trans-unit.source: OFF. In this mode the server will not reply to client commands.
trans-unit.target: OFF 。在这种模式下，服务器将不回复客户端命令。

trans-unit.source: ON. This is the default mode in which the server returns a reply to every command.
trans-unit.target: ON 。这是服务器返回对每个命令的答复的默认模式。

trans-unit.source: PXmilliseconds -- Set the specified expire time, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: PX 毫秒 -设置指定的到期时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: REPLACE -- Replace existing key on the remote instance.
trans-unit.target: REPLACE -替换远程实例上的现有密钥。

trans-unit.source: RETRYCOUNT <count>: Set the retry counter to the specified value. This counter is incremented every time a message is delivered again. Normally XCLAIM does not alter this counter, which is just served to clients when the XPENDING command is called: this way clients can detect anomalies, like messages that are never processed for some reason after a big number of delivery attempts.
trans-unit.target: RETRYCOUNT <count> ：将重试计数器设置为指定值。每次再次传递消息时，此计数器都会增加。通常，XCLAIM不会更改此计数器，该计数器仅在调用XPENDING命令时才提供给客户端：这样，客户端可以检测异常，例如在进行大量传递尝试后由于某些原因而从未处理过的消息。

trans-unit.source: SKIP. This mode skips the reply of command immediately after it.
trans-unit.target: SKIP 。此模式在其后立即跳过命令的答复。

trans-unit.source: STABLE subcommand: Clear any importing / migrating state from hash slot.
trans-unit.target: STABLE 子命令：清除哈希槽中的所有导入/迁移状态。

trans-unit.source: TIME <ms-unix-time>: This is the same as IDLE but instead of a relative amount of milliseconds, it sets the idle time to a specific Unix time (in milliseconds). This is useful in order to rewrite the AOF file generating XCLAIM commands.
trans-unit.target: TIME <ms-unix-time> ：与IDLE相同，但不是将毫秒作为相对时间，而是将空闲时间设置为特定的Unix时间（以毫秒为单位）。这对于重写生成XCLAIM命令的AOF文件很有用。

trans-unit.source: WITHCOORD: Also return the longitude,latitude coordinates of the matching items.
trans-unit.target: WITHCOORD ：还返回匹配项的经度，纬度坐标。

trans-unit.source: WITHDIST: Also return the distance of the returned items from the specified center. The distance is returned in the same unit as the unit specified as the radius argument of the command.
trans-unit.target: WITHDIST ：还返回返回的项目到指定中心的距离。距离以与指定为命令的radius参数的单位相同的单位返回。

trans-unit.source: WITHHASH: Also return the raw geohash-encoded sorted set score of the item, in the form of a 52 bit unsigned integer. This is only useful for low level hacks or debugging and is otherwise of little interest for the general user.
trans-unit.target: WITHHASH ：还以52位无符号整数的形式返回该项目的原始经过地理哈希编码的排序集得分。这仅对低级黑客或调试有用，否则对普通用户几乎没有兴趣。

trans-unit.source: XX -- Only set the key if it already exist.
trans-unit.target: XX -仅设置密钥（如果已存在）。

trans-unit.source: YES. Enable non-blocking asynchronous debugging of Lua scripts (changes are discarded).
trans-unit.target: YES 。启用Lua脚本的非阻塞异步调试（更改将被丢弃）。

trans-unit.source: active_defrag_hits: Number of value reallocations performed by active the defragmentation process
trans-unit.target: active_defrag_hits ：活动碎片整理过程执行的值重新分配的数量

trans-unit.source: active_defrag_key_hits: Number of keys that were actively defragmented
trans-unit.target: active_defrag_key_hits ：主动进行碎片整理的密钥数

trans-unit.source: active_defrag_key_misses: Number of keys that were skipped by the active defragmentation process
trans-unit.target: active_defrag_key_misses ：活动的碎片整理过程跳过的键数

trans-unit.source: active_defrag_misses: Number of aborted value reallocations started by the active defragmentation process
trans-unit.target: active_defrag_misses ：由活动碎片整理过程启动的中止值重新分配的数量

trans-unit.source: active_defrag_running: Flag indicating if active defragmentation is active
trans-unit.target: active_defrag_running ：该标志指示活动碎片整理是否处于活动状态

trans-unit.source: addr: address/port of the client
trans-unit.target: addr ：客户端的地址/端口

trans-unit.source: age: total duration of the connection in seconds
trans-unit.target: age ：连接的总持续时间（以秒为单位）

trans-unit.source: all: Return all sections
trans-unit.target: all ：返回所有部分

trans-unit.source: aof.buffer: The summed size in bytes of the current and rewrite AOF buffers (see INFO's aof_buffer_length and aof_rewrite_buffer_length, respectively)
trans-unit.target: aof.buffer ：当前和重写的AOF缓冲区的总大小（以字节为单位）（分别参见INFO的 aof_buffer_length 和 aof_rewrite_buffer_length ）

trans-unit.source: aof_base_size: AOF file size on latest startup or rewrite
trans-unit.target: aof_base_size ：最近一次启动或重写时的AOF文件大小

trans-unit.source: aof_buffer_length: Size of the AOF buffer
trans-unit.target: aof_buffer_length ：AOF缓冲区的大小

trans-unit.source: aof_current_rewrite_time_sec: Duration of the on-going AOF rewrite operation if any
trans-unit.target: aof_current_rewrite_time_sec ：正在进行的AOF重写操作的持续时间（如果有）

trans-unit.source: aof_current_size: AOF current file size
trans-unit.target: aof_current_size ：AOF当前文件大小

trans-unit.source: aof_delayed_fsync: Delayed fsync counter
trans-unit.target: aof_delayed_fsync ：延迟的fsync计数器

trans-unit.source: aof_enabled: Flag indicating AOF logging is activated
trans-unit.target: aof_enabled ：标志指示AOF记录已激活

trans-unit.source: aof_last_bgrewrite_status: Status of the last AOF rewrite operation
trans-unit.target: aof_last_bgrewrite_status ：上一次AOF重写操作的状态

trans-unit.source: aof_last_cow_size: The size in bytes of copy-on-write allocations during the last AOF rewrite operation
trans-unit.target: aof_last_cow_size ：上一次AOF重写操作期间写时复制分配的大小（以字节为单位）

trans-unit.source: aof_last_rewrite_time_sec: Duration of the last AOF rewrite operation in seconds
trans-unit.target: aof_last_rewrite_time_sec ：最后一次AOF重写操作的持续时间（以秒为单位）

trans-unit.source: aof_last_write_status: Status of the last write operation to the AOF
trans-unit.target: aof_last_write_status ：对AOF的最后写入操作的状态

trans-unit.source: aof_pending_bio_fsync: Number of fsync pending jobs in background I/O queue
trans-unit.target: aof_pending_bio_fsync ：后台I / O队列中的fsync挂起作业数

trans-unit.source: aof_pending_rewrite: Flag indicating an AOF rewrite operation will be scheduled once the on-going RDB save is complete.
trans-unit.target: aof_pending_rewrite ：一旦正在进行的RDB保存完成，表明将调度AOF重写操作的标志。

trans-unit.source: aof_rewrite_buffer_length: Size of the AOF rewrite buffer
trans-unit.target: aof_rewrite_buffer_length ：AOF重写缓冲区的大小

trans-unit.source: aof_rewrite_in_progress: Flag indicating a AOF rewrite operation is on-going
trans-unit.target: aof_rewrite_in_progress ：标志指示正在进行AOF重写操作

trans-unit.source: aof_rewrite_scheduled: Flag indicating an AOF rewrite operation will be scheduled once the on-going RDB save is complete.
trans-unit.target: aof_rewrite_scheduled ：一旦正在进行的RDB保存完成，表明将调度AOF重写操作的标志。

trans-unit.source: arch_bits: Architecture (32 or 64 bits)
trans-unit.target: arch_bits ：体系结构（32或64位）

trans-unit.source: atomicvar_api: Atomicvar API used by Redis
trans-unit.target: atomicvar_api ：Redis使用的Atomicvar API

trans-unit.source: base lib.
trans-unit.target: base 库

trans-unit.source: bitop lib.
trans-unit.target: bitop 库

trans-unit.source: blocked_clients: Number of clients pending on a blocking call (BLPOP, BRPOP, BRPOPLPUSH)
trans-unit.target: blocked_clients ：阻塞呼叫中待处理的客户端数（BLPOP，BRPOP，BRPOPLPUSH）

trans-unit.source: changes_since_last_save refers to the number of operations that produced some kind of changes in the dataset since the last time either SAVE or BGSAVE was called.
trans-unit.target: changes_since_last_save 是指自上次调用SAVE或BGSAVE以来在数据集中产生某种更改的操作数。

trans-unit.source: cjson lib.
trans-unit.target: cjson 库。

trans-unit.source: client_biggest_input_buf: biggest input buffer among current client connections
trans-unit.target: client_biggest_input_buf ：当前客户端连接中最大的输入缓冲区

trans-unit.source: client_longest_output_list: longest output list among current client connections
trans-unit.target: client_longest_output_list ：当前客户端连接中最长的输出列表

trans-unit.source: clients.normal: The total size in bytes of all clients overheads (output and query buffers, connection contexts)
trans-unit.target: clients.normal ：所有客户端开销（输出和查询缓冲区，连接上下文）的总大小（以字节为单位）

trans-unit.source: clients.slaves: The total size in bytes of all replicas overheads (output and query buffers, connection contexts)
trans-unit.target: clients.slaves ：所有副本开销（输出和查询缓冲区，连接上下文）的总大小（以字节为单位）

trans-unit.source: clients: Client connections section
trans-unit.target: clients ：客户连接部分

trans-unit.source: cluster: Redis Cluster section
trans-unit.target: cluster ：“ Redis群集”部分

trans-unit.source: cluster_current_epoch: The local Current Epoch variable. This is used in order to create unique increasing version numbers during fail overs.
trans-unit.target: cluster_current_epoch ：本地 Current Epoch 变量。这是为了在故障转移期间创建唯一的递增版本号。

trans-unit.source: cluster_enabled: Indicate Redis cluster is enabled
trans-unit.target: cluster_enabled ：指示Redis集群已启用

trans-unit.source: cluster_known_nodes: The total number of known nodes in the cluster, including nodes in HANDSHAKE state that may not currently be proper members of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: cluster_known_nodes ：集群中已知节点的总数，包括处于 HANDSHAKE 状态的节点，这些节点当前可能不是集群的适当成员。

trans-unit.source: cluster_my_epoch: The Config Epoch of the node we are talking with. This is the current configuration version assigned to this node.
trans-unit.target: cluster_my_epoch ：正在与之通信的节点的 Config Epoch 。这是分配给该节点的当前配置版本。

trans-unit.source: cluster_size: The number of master nodes serving at least one hash slot in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: cluster_size ：为群集中至少一个哈希槽服务的主节点数。

trans-unit.source: cluster_slots_assigned: Number of slots which are associated to some node (not unbound). This number should be 16384 for the node to work properly, which means that each hash slot should be mapped to a node.
trans-unit.target: cluster_slots_assigned ：与某个节点关联的插槽数（不是未绑定）。为了使节点正常工作，此数字应为16384，这意味着每个哈希槽都应映射到一个节点。

trans-unit.source: cluster_slots_fail: Number of hash slots mapping to a node in FAIL state. If this number is not zero the node is not able to serve queries unless cluster-require-full-coverage is set to no in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: cluster_slots_fail ：映射到处于 FAIL 状态的节点的哈希槽数。如果该数字不为零，则除非配置中 cluster-require-full-coverage 设置为 no ，否则该节点将无法处理查询。

trans-unit.source: cluster_slots_ok: Number of hash slots mapping to a node not in FAIL or PFAIL state.
trans-unit.target: cluster_slots_ok ：映射到未处于 FAIL 或 PFAIL 状态的节点的哈希槽数。

trans-unit.source: cluster_slots_pfail: Number of hash slots mapping to a node in PFAIL state. Note that those hash slots still work correctly, as long as the PFAIL state is not promoted to FAIL by the failure detection algorithm. PFAIL only means that we are currently not able to talk with the node, but may be just a transient error.
trans-unit.target: cluster_slots_pfail ：映射到处于 PFAIL 状态的节点的哈希槽数。请注意，只要故障检测算法未将 PFAIL 状态提升为 FAIL ，这些哈希槽仍可正常工作。 PFAIL 仅表示我们当前无法与该节点通信，而可能只是暂时错误。

trans-unit.source: cluster_state: State is ok if the node is able to receive queries. fail if there is at least one hash slot which is unbound (no node associated), in error state (node serving it is flagged with FAIL flag), or if the majority of masters can't be reached by this node.
trans-unit.target: cluster_state ：如果节点能够接收查询，则状态为 ok 。 fail ，如果有至少一个散列时隙是未结合的（无节点相关联），在错误的状态（节点服务它被判与失败标志），或者如果大部分的主人不能由该节点到达。

trans-unit.source: cluster_stats_messages_received: Number of messages received via the cluster node-to-node binary bus.
trans-unit.target: cluster_stats_messages_received ：通过集群节点到节点二进制总线接收的消息数。

trans-unit.source: cluster_stats_messages_sent: Number of messages sent via the cluster node-to-node binary bus.
trans-unit.target: cluster_stats_messages_sent ：通过集群节点到节点二进制总线发送的消息数。

trans-unit.source: cmd: last command played
trans-unit.target: cmd ：最后播放的命令

trans-unit.source: cmdstat_XXX: calls=XXX,usec=XXX,usec_per_call=XXX
trans-unit.target: cmdstat_XXX ： calls=XXX,usec=XXX,usec_per_call=XXX

trans-unit.source: cmsgpack lib.
trans-unit.target: cmsgpack 库。

trans-unit.source: commandstats: Redis command statistics
trans-unit.target: commandstats ：Redis命令统计信息

trans-unit.source: config-epoch: The configuration epoch (or version) of the current node (or of the current master if the node is a replica). Each time there is a failover, a new, unique, monotonically increasing configuration epoch is created. If multiple nodes claim to serve the same hash slots, the one with higher configuration epoch wins.
trans-unit.target: config-epoch ：当前节点（或当前主节点，如果该节点是副本）的配置时期（或版本）。每次进行故障转移时，都会创建一个新的，唯一的，单调增加的配置时代。如果多个节点声称服务于相同的哈希槽，则赢得配置更高纪元的节点。

trans-unit.source: config_file: The path to the config file
trans-unit.target: config_file ：配置文件的路径

trans-unit.source: connected_clients: Number of client connections (excluding connections from replicas)
trans-unit.target: connected_clients ：客户端连接数（不包括来自副本的连接）

trans-unit.source: connected_slaves: Number of connected replicas
trans-unit.target: connected_slaves ：已连接副本的数量

trans-unit.source: count > 0: Remove elements equal to value moving from head to tail.
trans-unit.target: count > 0 ：删除等于 value 移动的值的元素。

trans-unit.source: count < 0: Remove elements equal to value moving from tail to head.
trans-unit.target: count < 0 ：删除等于从尾到头的 value 元素。

trans-unit.source: count = 0: Remove all elements equal to value.
trans-unit.target: count = 0 ：删除所有等于 value 的元素。

trans-unit.source: cpu: CPU consumption statistics
trans-unit.target: cpu ：CPU消耗统计信息

trans-unit.source: dataset.bytes: The size in bytes of the dataset, i.e. overhead.total subtracted from total.allocated (see INFO's used_memory_dataset)
trans-unit.target: dataset.bytes ：在数据集中的字节大小，即 overhead.total 减去 total.allocated （参见INFO的 used_memory_dataset ）

trans-unit.source: dataset.percentage: The percentage of dataset.bytes out of the net memory usage

trans-unit.source: redis.call() is similar to redis.pcall(), the only difference is that if a Redis command call will result in an error, redis.call() will raise a Lua error that in turn will force EVAL to return an error to the command caller, while redis.pcall will trap the error and return a Lua table representing the error.
trans-unit.target: redis.call() 与 redis.pcall() 相似，唯一的区别是，如果Redis命令调用将导致错误，则 redis.call() 将引发Lua错误，进而将迫使EVAL返回错误到命令调用者，而 redis.pcall 将捕获错误并返回代表错误的Lua表。

trans-unit.source: redis.error_reply(error_string) returns an error reply. This function simply returns a single field table with the err field set to the specified string for you.
trans-unit.target: redis.error_reply(error_string) 返回错误回复。此函数仅返回一个字段表，其中 err 字段设置为您指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: slot: A hash slot number or range. Starting from argument number 9, but there may be up to 16384 entries in total (limit never reached). This is the list of hash slots served by this node. If the entry is just a number, is parsed as such. If it is a range, it is in the form start-end, and means that the node is responsible for all the hash slots from start to end including the start and end values.
trans-unit.target: slot ：哈希槽号或范围。从参数编号9开始，但总共可能有多达16384个条目（从未达到限制）。这是此节点服务的哈希槽的列表。如果条目只是一个数字，则将其解析为数字。如果它是一个范围，它的形式是 start-end ，以及装置，该节点负责从所有散列时隙 start 到 end ，包括开始和结束值。

trans-unit.source: start and end can also be negative numbers indicating offsets from the end of the list, where -1 is the last element of the list, -2 the penultimate element and so on.
trans-unit.target: start 和 end 也可以是负数，指示与列表末尾的偏移量，其中 -1 是列表的最后一个元素， -2 是倒数第二个元素，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: start and stop are inclusive ranges, so for example ZRANGE myzset 0 1 will return both the first and the second element of the sorted set.

trans-unit.source: CH: Modify the return value from the number of new elements added, to the total number of elements changed (CH is an abbreviation of changed). Changed elements are new elements added and elements already existing for which the score was updated. So elements specified in the command line having the same score as they had in the past are not counted. Note: normally the return value of ZADD only counts the number of new elements added.
trans-unit.target: CH：修改从加入新的元素，以改变元件的总数（CH是的缩写的数目返回值改变）。更改的元素是添加的新元素以及已更新其分数的现有元素。因此，命令行中指定的具有与过去相同分数的元素将不计算在内。注意：通常，ZADD的返回值仅计算添加的新元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: ERROR: both C1 and C2 acquired the lock because of the race condition.
trans-unit.target: 错误：由于竞争情况，C1和C2均获得了锁定。

trans-unit.source: FAIL: in this mode no operation is performed on overflows or underflows detected. The corresponding return value is set to NULL to signal the condition to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 失败：在此模式下，对检测到的上溢或下溢不执行任何操作。相应的返回值设置为NULL，以将条件告知调用方。

trans-unit.source: Importing slot:[slot_number-<-importing_from_node_id]
trans-unit.target: 导入插槽： [slot_number-<-importing_from_node_id]

trans-unit.source: Importing slots are yet not part of the nodes hash slot, there is a migration in progress. The node will accept queries about these slots only if the ASK command is used.
trans-unit.target: 导入插槽尚未成为节点哈希插槽的一部分，正在进行迁移。仅当使用 ASK 命令时，节点才会接受有关这些插槽的查询。

trans-unit.source: In the above code there is a race condition. If for some reason the client performs the INCR command but does not perform the EXPIRE the key will be leaked until we'll see the same IP address again.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的代码中有一个竞争条件。如果由于某种原因客户端执行INCR命令但未执行EXPIRE，则密钥将被泄漏，直到我们再次看到相同的IP地址为止。

trans-unit.target: Lua到Redis的转换表。

trans-unit.source: Migrating slot:[slot_number->-migrating_to_node_id]
trans-unit.target: 迁移插槽： [slot_number->-migrating_to_node_id]

trans-unit.source: Migrating slots are assigned to the node, but are being migrated to some other node. The node will accept queries if all the keys in the command exist already, otherwise it will emit what is called an ASK redirection, to force new keys creation directly in the importing node.
trans-unit.target: 迁移插槽已分配给该节点，但正在迁移到其他某个节点。如果命令中的所有键都已存在，则该节点将接受查询，否则它将发出所谓的ASK重定向，以直接在导入节点中强制创建新的键。

trans-unit.source: NX: Don't update already existing elements. Always add new elements.
trans-unit.target: NX：不要更新现有元素。始终添加新元素。

trans-unit.source: Non standard return value, just dumps the received commands in an infinite flow.
trans-unit.target: 非标准返回值，只是无限地转储接收到的命令。

trans-unit.source: Note that you should not rely on the fields exact position, nor on the number of fields, new fields may be added in the future. So a well behaving client should fetch the whole list, and report it to the user, for example, as a dictionary data structure. Low level clients such as C clients where the items will likely be reported back in a linear array should document that the order is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不应该依赖字段的确切位置，也不应该依赖字段的数量，将来可能会添加新的字段。因此，行为良好的客户端应获取整个列表，并将其作为字典数据结构报告给用户。低级客户端（例如C客户端），这些项目很可能会以线性数组形式报告回去，因此应记录订单未定义。

trans-unit.source: Note: starting with Redis 5 the project is no longer using the slave word. You can use TYPE replica instead, however the old form is still supported for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Redis 5开始，项目不再使用从站字。您可以改用 TYPE replica ，但是仍旧支持旧格式以实现向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: Note: Before Redis 3.2.0, an error is returned if source and destination names are the same.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Redis 3.2.0之前，如果源名称和目标名称相同，则会返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Note: The following pattern is discouraged in favor of the Redlock algorithm which is only a bit more complex to implement, but offers better guarantees and is fault tolerant.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不建议使用以下模式来支持Redlock算法，该算法实现起来稍微复杂一些，但是提供了更好的保证，并且具有容错能力。

trans-unit.source: Note: there is no GEODEL command because you can use ZREM in order to remove elements. The Geo index structure is just a sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 注意：因为您可以使用ZREM来删除元素，所以没有GEODEL命令。地理位置索引结构只是一个排序集。

trans-unit.source: Note: because of the high performance nature of Redis, it is possible to try a lot of passwords in parallel in very short time, so make sure to generate a strong and very long password so that this attack is infeasible.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于Redis的高性能，可以在很短的时间内并行尝试许多密码，因此请确保生成一个强度很高且很长的密码，这样才能避免这种攻击。

trans-unit.source: Note: this is a string operation because Redis does not have a dedicated integer type. The string stored at the key is interpreted as a base-10 64 bit signed integer to execute the operation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是一个字符串操作，因为Redis没有专用的整数类型。存储在密钥处的字符串被解释为以10为基数的64位带符号整数来执行该操作。

trans-unit.target: OVERFLOW[WRAP|SAT|FAIL]

trans-unit.source: Please note that:
trans-unit.target: 请注意：

trans-unit.source: Redis to Lua conversion table.
trans-unit.target: Redis到Lua的转换表。

trans-unit.source: SAT: uses saturation arithmetic, that is, on underflows the value is set to the minimum integer value, and on overflows to the maximum integer value. For example incrementing an i8 integer starting from value 120 with an increment of 10, will result into the value 127, and further increments will always keep the value at 127. The same happens on underflows, but towards the value is blocked at the most negative value.
trans-unit.target: SAT：使用饱和算法，即在下溢时将值设置为最小整数值，在上溢时将值设置为最大整数值。例如，从值120开始的 i8 整数以10的增量递增，将得到值127，并且进一步的递增将始终将值保持在127。下溢时也会发生同样的情况，但朝该值的阻塞最大为负值。

trans-unit.source: SET<type><offset><value> -- Set the specified bit field and returns its old value.
trans-unit.target: SET <type> <offset> <value> -设置指定的位字段并返回其旧值。

trans-unit.source: SHUTDOWN NOSAVE will prevent a DB saving operation even if one or more save points are configured. (You can think of this variant as an hypothetical ABORT command that just stops the server).
trans-unit.target: 即使配置了一个或多个保存点，SHUTDOWN NOSAVE也将阻止数据库保存操作。（您可以将此变体视为假设的ABORT命令，该命令只是停止服务器）。

trans-unit.source: SHUTDOWN SAVE will force a DB saving operation even if no save points are configured.
trans-unit.target: 即使未配置任何保存点，SHUTDOWN SAVE也会强制执行数据库保存操作。

trans-unit.source: The timeout argument is interpreted as an integer value specifying the maximum number of seconds to block. A timeout of zero can be used to block indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: timeout参数解释为一个整数值，该值指定要阻止的最大秒数。零超时可以无限期地阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: Depends on the script that is executed.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：取决于执行的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: For each stream mentioned: O(M) with M being the number of elements returned. If M is constant (e.g. always asking for the first 10 elements with COUNT), you can consider it O(1). On the other side when XREADGROUP blocks, XADD will pay the O(N) time in order to serve the N clients blocked on the stream getting new data.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：对于提到的每个流：O（M），M为返回的元素数。如果M为常数（例如，始终使用COUNT询问前10个元素），则可以将其视为O（1）。另一方面，当XREADGROUP阻塞时，XADD将付出O（N）时间，以便为在流上阻塞的N个客户端提供新数据提供服务。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: For each stream mentioned: O(N) with N being the number of elements being returned, it menas that XREAD-ing with a fixed COUNT is O(1). Note that when the BLOCK option is used, XADD will pay O(M) time in order to serve the M clients blocked on the stream getting new data.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：对于提到的每个流：O（N），其中N为要返回的元素数，它表示具有固定COUNT的XREAD-ing为O（1）。请注意，使用BLOCK选项时，XADD将花费O（M）时间，以便为在流上被阻塞的M个客户端获取新数据提供服务。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1)
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（1）

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for all the currently implemented subcommands.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：所有当前实现的子命令为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for all the subcommands, with the exception of the DESTROY subcommand which takes an additional O(M) time in order to delete the M entries inside the consumer group pending entries list (PEL).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：所有子命令为O（1），但DESTROY子命令除外，该命令花费额外的O（M）时间才能删除使用者组未决条目列表（PEL）中的M个条目。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for each element added, so O(N) to add N elements when the command is called with multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每个添加的元素为O（1），因此当使用多个参数调用命令时，O（N）要添加N个元素。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for each key removed regardless of its size. Then the command does O(N) work in a different thread in order to reclaim memory, where N is the number of allocations the deleted objects where composed of.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：删除每个密钥的O（1）大小无关。然后，该命令在不同的线程中执行O（N）以便回收内存，其中N是组成删除对象的分配数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for each message ID processed.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每个处理的消息ID的O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for each single item to delete in the stream, regardless of the stream size.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：流中要删除的每个单个项目的O（1），无论流大小如何。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for each subcommand specified
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每个指定的子命令为O（1）

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for every call. O(N) for a complete iteration, including enough command calls for the cursor to return back to 0. N is the number of elements inside the collection.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每次通话O（1）。O（N）表示完整的迭代，包括足以使游标返回到0的命令调用。N是集合内元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for every call. O(N) for a complete iteration, including enough command calls for the cursor to return back to 0. N is the number of elements inside the collection..
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每次通话O（1）。O（N）表示完整的迭代，包括足以使游标返回到0的命令调用。N是集合内元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) for every key.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每个键为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) to access the key and additional O(N*M) to serialized it, where N is the number of Redis objects composing the value and M their average size. For small string values the time complexity is thus O(1)+O(1*M) where M is small, so simply O(1).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（1）用于访问密钥，其他O（N * M）用于对其进行序列化，其中N是组成该值的Redis对象的数量，M是它们的平均大小。因此，对于较小的字符串值，时间复杂度为O（1）+ O（1 * M），其中M很小，因此简单地为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) to add every element.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（1）添加每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) to create the new key and additional O(N*M) to reconstruct the serialized value, where N is the number of Redis objects composing the value and M their average size. For small string values the time complexity is thus O(1)+O(1*M) where M is small, so simply O(1). However for sorted set values the complexity is O(N*M*log(N)) because inserting values into sorted sets is O(log(N)).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（1）用于创建新密钥，其他O（N * M）用于重建序列化的值，其中N是组成该值的Redis对象的数量，M是其平均大小。因此，对于较小的字符串值，时间复杂度为O（1）+ O（1 * M），其中M很小，因此简单地为O（1）。但是，对于排序的集合值，复杂度为O（N * M * log（N）），因为将值插入排序的集合中为O（log（N））。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1) with a very small average constant time when called with a single key. O(N) with N being the number of keys, and much bigger constant times, when called with multiple keys.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：用单个键调用时O（1）的平均恒定时间非常短。O（N），其中N是键的数目，并且在使用多个键调用时，常数时间要大得多。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1), not counting the time taken to copy the new string in place. Usually, this string is very small so the amortized complexity is O(1). Otherwise, complexity is O(M) with M being the length of the value argument.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（1），不计算将新字符串复制到位所需的时间。通常，此字符串非常小，因此摊销后的复杂度为O（1）。否则，复杂度为O（M），其中M为值参数的长度。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(1). The amortized time complexity is O(1) assuming the appended value is small and the already present value is of any size, since the dynamic string library used by Redis will double the free space available on every reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（1）。假设附加值很小并且已经存在的值具有任意大小，则摊余时间复杂度为O（1），因为Redis使用的动态字符串库会使每个重新分配上的可用空间加倍。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(M*log(N)) with N being the number of elements in the sorted set and M the number of elements to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（M * log（N）），其中N是排序集中的元素数，M是要删除的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N)
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N）

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) for the CHANNELS subcommand, where N is the number of active channels, and assuming constant time pattern matching (relatively short channels and patterns). O(N) for the NUMSUB subcommand, where N is the number of requested channels. O(1) for the NUMPAT subcommand.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： CHANNELS子命令的O（N），其中N是活动通道的数量，并假设时间模式匹配恒定（相对短的通道和模式）。NUMSUB子命令的O（N），其中N是请求的通道数。NUMPAT子命令为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) to merge N HyperLogLogs, but with high constant times.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N）以合并N个HyperLogLogs，但具有较高的恒定时间。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) when N is number of commands to look up
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：当N为要查询的命令数时为O（N）

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the length of the list.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the length of the list. Setting either the first or the last element of the list is O(1).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是列表的长度。将列表的第一个或最后一个元素设置为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the length of the returned string. The complexity is ultimately determined by the returned length, but because creating a substring from an existing string is very cheap, it can be considered O(1) for small strings.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是返回字符串的长度。复杂度最终取决于返回的长度，但是由于从现有字符串创建子字符串非常便宜，因此对于小字符串，可以将其视为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of arguments to the command
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是命令的参数数量

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of bytes in the key
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是密钥中的字节数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of channels to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要订阅的频道数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of client connections
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是客户端连接数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of clients already subscribed to a channel.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是已订阅频道的客户端数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of elements to be removed by the operation.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要由操作删除的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of elements to traverse before seeing the value pivot. This means that inserting somewhere on the left end on the list (head) can be considered O(1) and inserting somewhere on the right end (tail) is O(N).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是看到值枢轴之前要遍历的元素数。这意味着在列表（头）左端的某处插入可以视为O（1），而在右端（尾部）的某处插入则认为O（N）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of elements to traverse to get to the element at index. This makes asking for the first or the last element of the list O(1).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N）其中N是要遍历才能到达索引处元素的元素数。这使得询问列表O（1）的第一个或最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of failure reports
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是故障报告的数量

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of fields being requested.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是请求的字段数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of fields being set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要设置的字段数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of fields to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要删除的字段数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of keys that will be removed. When a key to remove holds a value other than a string, the individual complexity for this key is O(M) where M is the number of elements in the list, set, sorted set or hash. Removing a single key that holds a string value is O(1).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是将被删除的键的数量。当要删除的键包含字符串以外的值时，此键的单个复杂度为O（M），其中M是列表，集合，排序集合或哈希中元素的数量。删除包含字符串值的单个键为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of keys that will be touched.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是将要触摸的按键数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of keys to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要检索的键的数目。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of keys to set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要设置的键数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of known nodes. The command may execute a FLUSHALL as a side effect.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是已知节点的数量。该命令可能会执行FLUSHALL作为副作用。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of members to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要删除的成员数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of patterns the client is already subscribed to.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是客户端已预订的模式数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the number of samples.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是样本数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the set cardinality.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N）其中N是设置的基数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the size of the hash.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是散列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the total number of Cluster nodes
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是群集节点的总数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the total number of Redis commands
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是Redis命令的总数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the total number of elements in all given sets.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N）其中N是所有给定集合中元素的总数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) where N is the total number of hash slot arguments
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是哈希槽参数的总数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the length in bytes of the script body.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），N为脚本主体的字节长度。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of elements being returned. If N is constant (e.g. always asking for the first 10 elements with COUNT), you can consider it O(1).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），N为要返回的元素数。如果N为常数（例如，始终要求使用COUNT来搜索前10个元素），则可以将其视为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of elements returned, so asking for a small fixed number of entries per call is O(1). When the command returns just the summary it runs in O(1) time assuming the list of consumers is small, otherwise there is additional O(N) time needed to iterate every consumer.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N为返回的元素数，因此每次调用要求固定的条目数为O（1）。当命令仅返回摘要时，假设使用者列表很小，则它以O（1）的时间运行，否则迭代每个使用者需要额外的O（N）时间。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of elements returned. If N is constant (e.g. always asking for the first 10 elements with COUNT), you can consider it O(1).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N为返回的元素数。如果N为常数（例如，始终要求使用COUNT来搜索前10个元素），则可以将其视为O（1）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of keys in the database, under the assumption that the key names in the database and the given pattern have limited length.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N为数据库中密钥的数目，假设数据库中的密钥名称和给定模式的长度有限。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of returned items for the subcommands CONSUMERS and GROUPS. The STREAM subcommand is O(log N) with N being the number of items in the stream.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是子命令CONSUMERS和GROUPS返回的项数。STREAM子命令为O（log N），N为流中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of scripts in cache
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），N为缓存中的脚本数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N) with N being the number of scripts to check (so checking a single script is an O(1) operation).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是要检查的脚本数（因此，检查单个脚本是O（1）操作）。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N)+O(M log(M)) with N being the sum of the sizes of the input sorted sets, and M being the number of elements in the resulting sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N）+ O（M log（M）），其中N是输入排序集的大小之和，M是结果排序集中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N), with N being the number of evicted entries. Constant times are very small however, since entries are organized in macro nodes containing multiple entries that can be released with a single deallocation.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N），其中N是被逐出条目的数量。但是，恒定时间非常短，因为条目是在包含多个条目的宏节点中组织的，这些条目可以通过一次取消分配就可以释放。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N*K)+O(M*log(M)) worst case with N being the smallest input sorted set, K being the number of input sorted sets and M being the number of elements in the resulting sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：最差的情况是O（N * K）+ O（M * log（M）），其中N是最小的输入排序集合，K是输入排序集合的数量，M是结果排序集合中的元素数量。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N*M) worst case where N is the cardinality of the smallest set and M is the number of sets.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N * M）最坏的情况，其中N是最小集合的基数，M是集合数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N+M) where N is the number of clients subscribed to the receiving channel and M is the total number of subscribed patterns (by any client).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N + M），其中N是订阅接收通道的客户端数，M是订阅模式（任何客户端）的总数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N+M) where N is the number of patterns the client is already subscribed and M is the number of total patterns subscribed in the system (by any client).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N + M），其中N是客户端已预订的模式数量，M是系统中（由任何客户端）预订的总模式数量。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N+M*log(M)) where N is the number of elements in the list or set to sort, and M the number of returned elements. When the elements are not sorted, complexity is currently O(N) as there is a copy step that will be avoided in next releases.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N + M * log（M）），其中N是列表中或要排序的元素的数量，M是返回的元素的数量。如果不对元素进行排序，则当前的复杂度为O（N），因为在下一版本中将避免复制步骤。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(N+log(M)) where N is the number of elements inside the bounding box of the circular area delimited by center and radius and M is the number of items inside the index.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（N + log（M）），其中N是圆形区域的边界框内的元素数，该元素由中心和半径界定，M是索引内的项数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(S+N) where S is the distance of start offset from HEAD for small lists, from nearest end (HEAD or TAIL) for large lists; and N is the number of elements in the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（S + N）其中S是小列表到HEAD的起始偏移量，大列表到最近的头（HEAD或TAIL）的起始偏移量；N是指定范围内的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log N) where N is the number of client connections
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log N），其中N是客户端连接数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log N) with N being the number of messages in the PEL of the consumer group.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log N），N为使用者组PEL中的消息数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N))
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N））

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)) for each item added, where N is the number of elements in the sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：添加的每一项的O（log（N）），其中N是排序集中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)) for each member requested, where N is the number of elements in the sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度：每个请求成员的O（log（N）），其中N是排序集中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)) where N is the number of elements in the sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N）），其中N是排序集中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)) where N is the number of requested keys
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N）），其中N是请求的密钥数

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)) with N being the number of elements in the sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N）），其中N为排序集中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)*M) with N being the number of elements in the sorted set, and M being the number of elements popped.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N）* M），其中N是排序集中元素的数量，M是弹出元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)+M) with N being the number of elements in the sorted set and M the number of elements being returned. If M is constant (e.g. always asking for the first 10 elements with LIMIT), you can consider it O(log(N)).
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N）+ M），N为排序集中的元素数，M为要返回的元素数。如果M为常数（例如，始终要求使用LIMIT限制前10个元素），则可以将其视为O（log（N））。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)+M) with N being the number of elements in the sorted set and M the number of elements removed by the operation.
trans-unit.target: 时间复杂度： O（log（N）+ M），其中N是排序集中的元素数，M是操作删除的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Time complexity: O(log(N)+M) with N being the number of elements in the sorted set and M the number of elements returned.
